title: Person: White Hair
description:
A person with white hair. This emoji maintains white hair no matter which skin tone is chosen. This emoji may be used to talk about people with white hair in a gender-inclusive way.

Variants include ğŸ‘©‍ğŸ¦³ Woman with White Hair and ğŸ‘¨‍ğŸ¦³ Man with White Hair. See also ğŸ§“ Older Person, which is similar, though is shown with wrinkles and gray hair on most platforms.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person with white hair emoji presents a dignified and wise individual, characterized by gracefully styled silver-white hair that catches the light with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. The figure's gentle smile and calm posture, rendered with soft, rounded edges, convey a sense of experience, knowledge, and warmth. This emoji is frequently used to represent elders, grandparents, or anyone embodying wisdom and a long life, adding a touch of respect and affection to digital conversations.
